Package UseCase

Class ChatManager

java.lang.Object
UseCase.ChatManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class ChatManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Manages the chats in our program. It calls methods in the Chats or in the messages in the Chats.
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • createChat

      public java.util.UUID createChat​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> memberUsernames)
      Create a new chat and add it to the list of all chats
      Parameters:
      memberUsernames - The users who are in the new chat
      Returns:
      The id of the new chat

    • sendMessageToChat

      public void sendMessageToChat​(java.util.UUID chatId, java.lang.String senderUsername, java.time.LocalDateTime time, java.lang.String content)
      Send a message to one chat PRECONDITION : senderUsername is in this chat and the time is the current time
      Parameters:
      chatId - The id of the chat that the message is being sent in
      senderUsername - The username of the sender
      time - The time the message was sent
      content - The content of the message

    • getChatContainingUsers

      public java.util.UUID getChatContainingUsers​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> usernames)
      Get the chat containing only the specified users. Returns null if no such chat exists PRECONDITION : There is only one chat between all the users in usernames
      Parameters:
      usernames - A list of the usernames of the users in the chat
      Returns:
      The id of the chat containing all of the given users if it exists, or null otherwise

    • getUserChats

      public java.util.List<java.util.UUID> getUserChats​(java.lang.String username)
      Getter for all of a user's chats
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user
      Returns:
      All of the user's chats

    • getAllChats

      public java.util.List<java.util.UUID> getAllChats()

      Returns:
      List of all chats

    • isChatEmpty

      public boolean isChatEmpty​(java.util.UUID chatId)
      Checks if a chat has no messages
      Parameters:
      chatId - The id of the chat being checked
      Returns:
      A boolean to represent whether or not the chat is empty

    • getChatMessages

      public java.util.List<java.util.UUID> getChatMessages​(java.lang.String username, java.util.UUID chatId)
      Get all messages of a chat and updates the last viewed message. PRECONDITION : user exists in chat
      Parameters:
      chatId - The id of the chat being looked at
      Returns:
      A list of all the messages in the chat

    • getNewMessages

      public java.util.List<java.util.UUID> getNewMessages​(java.lang.String username, java.util.UUID chatId)
      Get all new messages for a user PRECONDITION : Username is in the chat
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user
      chatId - The id of the chat containing the new messages
      Returns:
      The new messages to that user
